MESSAGE.JP: と、視線を上にした。
い大きい建物が、山間に建っている。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a tall, white building between the mountains.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a tall, white building between the mountains.

MESSAGE.JP: 病院のようだ。
理樹@（あの病院なんだろうか…）
理樹@（小毬さんのお兄さんが亡くなった場所って言うのは…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Could that be the hospital where her brother passed away...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Could that be the hospital where her brother passed away...?)

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（小次郎さんは、あの施設を『ここ』って言ってたな）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Because Kojirou-san implied that her brother used to be held at the facility he, Kojirou-san, was now staying at.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Because Kojirou-san implied that her brother used to be held at the facility he, Kojirou-san, was now staying at.)

MESSAGE.JP: いうことは、あの場所で…？
小毬@「理樹君、どうしたの？」
理樹@「ん、なんでもない」
小毬@「やっぱり元気ないね…」
理樹@「そんなことないって」
理樹@「あ、なんかお菓子もらえる？」
小毬@「うん、いっぱいあるよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Sure. I've got a lot of them～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Sure. I've got a lot of them～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんからポッキーの箱を受け取る。
MESSAGE.EN: She handed me a box of Pocky.
MESSAGE.Translation: She handed me a box of Pocky.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（真実は伝えるべきなんだろうか…）
や、こんな事ばかり考えているから、きっと元気がないように見えてしまうんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: No, I'd better not dwell on that now. It's probably the reason I look down.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, I'd better not dwell on that now. It's probably the reason I look down.

MESSAGE.JP: ッキーを一本くわえて、それを口の中で半分に折る。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a piece of Pocky into my mouth and broke it between my teeth.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a piece of Pocky into my mouth and broke it between my teeth.

MESSAGE.JP: れを口の中でチョコが溶けるまで転がしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I rolled the piece around in my mouth until the chocolate melted.
MESSAGE.Translation: I rolled the piece around in my mouth until the chocolate melted.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そういえば小毬さん、道合ってるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Komari-san, are you sure this is the right way?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Komari-san, are you sure this is the right way?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「多分だいじょうぶだよ」
理樹@「だって、よく覚えてないんじゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But you said you didn't remember well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But you said you didn't remember well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うーん？　でも、ここには何度か来てるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hmm. But I've come here a couple of times before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmm. But I've come here a couple of times before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「その時は何か思い出そうなんて、全然考えてなかったけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I didn't try at all to remember anything at those times, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I didn't try at all to remember anything at those times, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そっか…」
小毬@「でも、それもあるけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝And that's not the only reason we are here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝And that's not the only reason we are here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「綺麗なんだよ、湖」
小毬@「理樹君と見たら楽しいだろうなぁ～って思ったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝So I thought it'd be awesome to see it with you, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝So I thought it'd be awesome to see it with you, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っこりと笑う。
んとなく、それだけで僕のほうが元気付けられてるような気になって来た。
MESSAGE.EN: At her thoughtful remark I cheered up a little despite myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: At her thoughtful remark I cheered up a little despite myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、理樹君も笑顔が一番」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, I like you best when you smile.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, I like you best when you smile.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ずっと笑顔でいられるって言うのが、一番の幸せだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝The happiest thing would be if you could always have a smile on your face.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝The happiest thing would be if you could always have a smile on your face.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだね」
理樹@「…僕も、そう思う」
はもう一度、小毬さんに笑い返して見せた。
MESSAGE.EN: Once again I returned her smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once again I returned her smile.

MESSAGE.JP: らに奥まった林道に入り、進んでいく。
MESSAGE.EN: We entered a smaller, secluded forest path.
MESSAGE.Translation: We entered a smaller, secluded forest path.

MESSAGE.JP: 分ほど歩くと、林道の先が開けてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: After a five minute walk the surroundings gradually began to clear up.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a five minute walk the surroundings gradually began to clear up.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、着いた？」
小毬@「うん、そうみたい」
々を抜けると、僕は空を見上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: As we left the forest path behind, I raised my eyes to the sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: As we left the forest path behind, I raised my eyes to the sky.

MESSAGE.JP: い光に、少し目を細める。
MESSAGE.EN: The light was so bright it blinded my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: The light was so bright it blinded my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…いい、天気だな）
も同じことを思ったはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I believe I had the same thought in the morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: I believe I had the same thought in the morning.

MESSAGE.JP: けど、今はそのときより、それがより強く感じる事が出来た。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But this time I could really feel it with my whole being.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But this time I could really feel it with my whole being.

MESSAGE.JP: れが『よく見える』ってことなら。
MESSAGE.EN: If this was what Komari-san called ❝seeing things better,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: If this was what Komari-san called ❝seeing things better,❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…小毬さんのおかげかな）
小毬@「理樹君っ、ボート屋さんがあるよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, look, there's a boat rental shop over there～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, look, there's a boat rental shop over there～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: を歩いていた小毬さんに、そう呼びかけられる。
MESSAGE.EN: She shouted from a short distance ahead of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shouted from a short distance ahead of me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、じゃあ乗ろうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's get on one, why don't we?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's get on one, why don't we?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うんっ」
毬さんと向かい合わせで、ボートに乗る。
MESSAGE.EN: We were seated in the boat facing each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were seated in the boat facing each other.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ふんふんふーん～」
毬さんは何やらご機嫌な様子で鼻歌にあわせてリズムを取っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was humming happily and tapping her fingers to the rhythm.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was humming happily and tapping her fingers to the rhythm.

MESSAGE.JP: れを見ながら、ちょっと苦笑する。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking at her made me break into a smile as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking at her made me break into a smile as well.

MESSAGE.JP: 本当に、見てるこっちまでなんだか楽しそうに思えてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Just watching her doing that was enough to put me in a merry mood as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Just watching her doing that was enough to put me in a merry mood as well.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「なんだか貸切みたいだねえ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Looks like we have the whole lake to ourselves～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Looks like we have the whole lake to ourselves～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…そういえば）
渡してみても、僕たちのほかに人はいないみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't see any other people around but us.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't see any other people around but us.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（こんなにきれいな場所なのにな）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Why not? The place is certainly beautiful enough to visit...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Why not? The place is certainly beautiful enough to visit...)

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…穴場ってやつなんだろうか）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Is it a great hidden spot only a few people know about?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Is it a great hidden spot only a few people know about?)

MESSAGE.JP: あ、人が多いよりは全然いいか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyways, it's naturally way better than it being crowded in here...
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyways, it's naturally way better than it being crowded in here...

MESSAGE.JP: めて、湖を見た。
MESSAGE.EN: I gazed at the lake again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gazed at the lake again.

MESSAGE.JP: を映した青い湖、対岸の緑を境界にして、さらに真っ青な空が広がる。
MESSAGE.EN: The surface of the blue lake was a mirror of the sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: The surface of the blue lake was a mirror of the sky.

MESSAGE.JP: が吹くとさざめく水面は、きらきらと太陽を反射していた。
MESSAGE.EN: Wind gently rippled the surface, and the water reflected the bright shine of the sun in a shining sparkle.
MESSAGE.Translation: Wind gently rippled the surface, and the water reflected the bright shine of the sun in a shining sparkle.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…きれいだね」
う呟く。
小毬@「うん、とってもきれいだよね」
小毬@「理樹君も気に入ってくれたかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I hope you like this place, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I hope you like this place, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
小毬@「えへへ、よかった～」
小毬@「やっぱり理樹君なら、わかってくれる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝As I thought, you do understand me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝As I thought, you do understand me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れくさそうに言う。
がオールをこいで、湖のちょうど真ん中辺りまで進む。
MESSAGE.EN: I rowed the boat toward the center of the lake.
MESSAGE.Translation: I rowed the boat toward the center of the lake.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…結構疲れるねこれ」
小毬@「一休みする？」
理樹@「そうしようか」
ールから手を離し、手首をぶらぶらとさせてほぐす。
MESSAGE.EN: I took my hands off of the oars and rotated my wrists.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took my hands off of the oars and rotated my wrists.

MESSAGE.JP: を休めながら、小毬さんのほうを見る。
小毬さんは、水面をじっと見つめていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She was staring intently at the water's surface.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She was staring intently at the water's surface.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「小毬さん？」
小毬@「ふえ？　なに？」
理樹@「何か見えるのかと思って」
小毬@「おさかなさんが泳いでますよ～」
理樹@「へえ、どれどれ」
も水面をじっと見つめてみた。
MESSAGE.EN: I also peered into the water.
MESSAGE.Translation: I also peered into the water.

MESSAGE.JP: 水奥のほうに動く影がいくつか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...There were shadows moving deep under the surface.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There were shadows moving deep under the surface.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ホントだ」
小毬@「ほわー、いっぱいいる～…」
だいぶ夢中になってみているようだった。
小毬@「えさとかお店で売ってたよね。買っておけばよかったな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝They sold fish food at the boat rental shop. Wish we'd bought some...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝They sold fish food at the boat rental shop. Wish we'd bought some...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「小毬さん、魚とかホント好きなんだねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You really like watching fishes and such.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You really like watching fishes and such.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、だいすきですよ～」
小毬@「ほわ～…」
また夢中になって見始める。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She quickly resumed staring at the fishes.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She quickly resumed staring at the fishes.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ、お菓子あげればいいんじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, why don't you give them a snack?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, why don't you give them a snack?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「それはだめだよ。湖が汚れちゃう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝No. You have to keep the water clean.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝No. You have to keep the water clean.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、そうか…」
ょっと反省した。
小毬@「汚れちゃったら、何も見えなくなっちゃうからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Once the lake gets dirty, you can't see what's in there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Once the lake gets dirty, you can't see what's in there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「…それでも、底のほうは見えないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...It's not clear enough to see to the very bottom even now. But still.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...It's not clear enough to see to the very bottom even now. But still.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もっとよく見えたら、きっときれいだろうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If the water were cleaner the lake would look even more beautiful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If the water were cleaner the lake would look even more beautiful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「…うん」
小毬@「あなたの目が、もう少し、ほんのちょっとだけ見えるようになりますように」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝May your eyes be able to see things better, even if just a little.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝May your eyes be able to see things better, even if just a little.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 前に聞いた言葉と同じこと。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The same line she had said before.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The same line she had said before.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、僕の目だけ見えるようになってもしょうがないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it'd be pointless if only my eyes grew better.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it'd be pointless if only my eyes grew better.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「一緒に見えないとさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I want to share what I see with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I want to share what I see with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「あ…」
小毬@「えへへ、そうだね」
小毬@「…私の目も見えるようには、なって欲しいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...I hope my eyes also grow better.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...I hope my eyes also grow better.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんはもう一度、青い水面を目に映した。
MESSAGE.EN: She cast another glance at the water's glittering surface.
MESSAGE.Translation: She cast another glance at the water's glittering surface.

MESSAGE.JP: その目は自分の見えない記憶を見ようとしているものだから、寂しそうに見えるんだと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: ...There was a sad tint in her eyes. I suspected it was because they were trying to see that which she had forgotten.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There was a sad tint in her eyes. I suspected it was because they were trying to see that which she had forgotten.

MESSAGE.JP: く見える小毬さんの目でも、それは多分、どれだけ目を凝らしても見えないものみたいだから。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though her eyes are much better than mine, what she was attempting to see was not so easy to see. Rather, I didn't think it could be seen.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though her eyes are much better than mine, what she was attempting to see was not so easy to see. Rather, I didn't think it could be seen.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やっぱりさ」
小毬@「ふえ？」
理樹@「…思い出したいんだよね、お兄さんのこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You want to remember your older brother, don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You want to remember your older brother, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん」
小毬@「…できればね」
理樹@「でもさ」
理樹@「…もし思い出しても、それで会えなかったら意味がないんじゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What if you found out by remembering him, that you can't see him anymore? Wouldn't that be meaningless?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What if you found out by remembering him, that you can't see him anymore? Wouldn't that be meaningless?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「意味はあるとおもうよ」
小毬@「…思い出して本当に会いたいのは、昔の私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...The one I really want to meet is who I used to be.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...The one I really want to meet is who I used to be.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「なくしものは寂しいよ」
小毬@「使い古しの消しゴムをなくしちゃっても、私は一晩しょんぼりしてしまいます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝If I even lose a worn-out eraser I feel down all night long.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝If I even lose a worn-out eraser I feel down all night long.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「だから、なくし物は探すんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝That's why I look for what I have lost.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝That's why I look for what I have lost.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そっか…」
小毬@「あーうん、でもやっぱり会ってみたいのかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, but I think I want to meet him after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, but I think I want to meet him after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「よくわかんないや、そのあたりは」
毬さんが無くしたものは、たぶんもう永遠に手に入らないものなんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: What she has lost is probably never going to be found.
MESSAGE.Translation: What she has lost is probably never going to be found.

MESSAGE.JP: そのことを知ったら、小毬さんはきっと悲しむと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I think she will cry if she finds that out.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I think she will cry if she finds that out.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（いいじゃないか、悲しいことなんて目をつぶって、見ないようにしてれば）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Just close your eyes and you won't see anything sad, Riki.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Just close your eyes and you won't see anything sad, Riki.)

MESSAGE.JP: くし物を探して、それが手に入らないのを知るなんて、なんにも報われない。
MESSAGE.EN: Seeking something you lost and finding out you can't ever get it back. That's nothing but pointless.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seeking something you lost and finding out you can't ever get it back. That's nothing but pointless.

MESSAGE.JP: ったらそんな現実なんて、僕が隠してしまえばいい。
MESSAGE.EN: So what I should do for her is cover up the truth from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: So what I should do for her is cover up the truth from her.

MESSAGE.JP: そうすればきっと、小毬さんはそんな思いをしなくてすむと、思う。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Then she wouldn't have to get depressed for no good reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Then she wouldn't have to get depressed for no good reason.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…見つからないならさ」
理樹@「見つけなくて、いいんじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think you have to find him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think you have to find him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「え？」
理樹@「もしかしたらさ、本当に夢の中だけにいるのかもしれないじゃない、お兄さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It might be true that he only exists in your dreams.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It might be true that he only exists in your dreams.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「そ、それはそうだけど…」
理樹@「…いないってわかっちゃうほうが寂しいことだって僕は思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Finding out that he doesn't exist would make you much sadder. That's my opinion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Finding out that he doesn't exist would make you much sadder. That's my opinion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だからさ」
理樹@「…僕じゃ代わりになれないかな」
理樹@「その、お兄さんの代わり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I mean, a substitute for your brother.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I mean, a substitute for your brother.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「お兄さんの夢を見るのが幸せならさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If dreaming of him makes you happy,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If dreaming of him makes you happy,❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…それまででも、それからでも、僕がその代わりになってあげる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I want to take his place to make you happy until you next dream of him, and even after you dream of him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I want to take his place to make you happy until you next dream of him, and even after you dream of him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「無理、かな…」
小毬@「わかんない…」
小毬@「わかんないけど…」
小毬@「うわあ、なんかすっごい嬉しいよ…」
小毬@「うわあー、どうしよどうしよっ、ホントになんかわかんないけどものすごい嬉しいよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uwah, what should I do? What should I do? I really don't know, but I'm just so happy～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uwah, what should I do? What should I do? I really don't know, but I'm just so happy～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、なんか結構頑張ってカッコいいこと言ったつもりなんだけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I did try my best to sound as cool as I could...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I did try my best to sound as cool as I could...❞

MESSAGE.JP: つもどおりの反応というかなんというか。
MESSAGE.EN: Her reaction was just as always.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her reaction was just as always.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、理樹君とってもカッコよかったです」
小毬@「なんかね…」
小毬@「もう、それでもいいかなって思っちゃうくらい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝You sounded cool enough to make me think that'd be enough for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝You sounded cool enough to make me think that'd be enough for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She said it with a broad smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said it with a broad smile.

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり、この方が、きっといい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I'm sure this is for the best.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I'm sure this is for the best.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ねえ、理樹君っ」
